  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Driver_Statistics
    findDriverBasedOnUUID(UUID uniqueId)
    Finds a Driver_Statistics object in the arraylist allDrivers, based on a UUID uniqueID value.
    PetrolStation
    findPetrolStationBasedOnUUID(UUID uniqueId)
    Finds a PetrolStation object in the arraylist allPetrolStations, based on a UUID uniqueID value.
    void
    modifyComboBoxList()
    This method updates the combobox list in TrafficSimulator_StatisticsDropDownMenu (tsddm) so that they point to the objects from the arraylists (allDrivers and allPetrolStations).
    void
    readDriverAndVehicleStats()
    This method reads the driver and vehicle stats, by accepting the drivers.txt file from the statistics folder and instantiating objects based on those values in the file, then adding the objects to the allDrivers arraylist.
    void
    readPetrolStationStats()
    This method reads the petrol station stats, by accepting the petrolstations.txt file from the statistics folder and instantiating objects based on those values in the file, then adding the objects to the allPetrolStations arraylist.
    void
    updateStats(Driver_Statistics driver)
    Updates the label values so they match the values of the passed in object.
    void
    updateStats(PetrolStation p)
    overloaded variation of the update stats method, updates the label values so they match the values of the passed in object.

    • TrafficSimulator_StatisticsController

      public TrafficSimulator_StatisticsController(TrafficSimulator_Statistics view) throws IOException
      This is a constructor for the Statistics Controller
      Parameters:
      view - A TrafficSimulator_Statistics instance
      Throws:
      IOException - if the text files that hold the statistics cannot be found, throw this exception

  • Method Details

    • modifyComboBoxList

      public void modifyComboBoxList()
      This method updates the combobox list in TrafficSimulator_StatisticsDropDownMenu (tsddm) so that they point to the objects from the arraylists (allDrivers and allPetrolStations).

    • updateStats

      public void updateStats(Driver_Statistics driver)
      Updates the label values so they match the values of the passed in object.
      Parameters:
      driver - Driver_Statistics object instance

    • updateStats

      public void updateStats(PetrolStation p)
      overloaded variation of the update stats method, updates the label values so they match the values of the passed in object.
      Parameters:
      p - PetrolStation object instance

    • readDriverAndVehicleStats

      public void readDriverAndVehicleStats() throws IOException
      This method reads the driver and vehicle stats, by accepting the drivers.txt file from the statistics folder and instantiating objects based on those values in the file, then adding the objects to the allDrivers arraylist.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the text file is not found or path cannot be accessed, throw this exception.

    • readPetrolStationStats

      public void readPetrolStationStats() throws IOException
      This method reads the petrol station stats, by accepting the petrolstations.txt file from the statistics folder and instantiating objects based on those values in the file, then adding the objects to the allPetrolStations arraylist.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the text file is not found or path cannot be accessed, throw this exception.

    • findDriverBasedOnUUID

      public Driver_Statistics findDriverBasedOnUUID(UUID uniqueId)
      Finds a Driver_Statistics object in the arraylist allDrivers, based on a UUID uniqueID value.
      Parameters:
      uniqueId - UUID Unique ID value
      Returns:
      a Driver_Statistics object that matches the passed in UUID uniqueID.

    • findPetrolStationBasedOnUUID

      public PetrolStation findPetrolStationBasedOnUUID(UUID uniqueId)
      Finds a PetrolStation object in the arraylist allPetrolStations, based on a UUID uniqueID value.
      Parameters:
      uniqueId - UUID Unique ID value
      Returns:
      a PetrolStation object that matches the passed in UUID uniqueID.
